properties.description: The space is open to anyone we are very welcoming we are open on Monday and Wednesday 09.30/11.00 this can go on till 13.00 we serve tea and coffee and hot soup for Lunch
properties.title: Bucknall Village Hall Warm Space

properties.address: Mareham-le-Fen Community Centre, Boston, Lincolnshire PE22 7QL
properties.description: Our warm space is open to all 12-2 on the first Tuesday of the month. Lunch is provided, donations towards lunch are welcome but only if you feel you can. Come along and meet up with your friends and make new ones.
properties.title: Lunch Bunch
